metadata.Title: CVE-2023-31616 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium.
metadata.Description: An issue in the bif_mod component of openlink virtuoso-opensource v7.2.9 allows attackers to cause a Denial of Service (DoS) via crafted SQL statements.

criterions.comment: virtuoso-opensource: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
